headline: The Daily Buzz: Utah Gov. Spencer Cox declares state of emergency for drought
author: Daedan Olander
sentences: Also, long-time Tribune employee Tim Fitzpatrick has picked up the metaphorical pen again and joins “The Daily Buzz” to talk about his new beat on renewable energy.
Politics reporters Bryan Schott and Kim Bojórquez wrap up today’s episode with a preview of Saturday’s Republican and Democratic state conventions.
Listen to ‘The Daily Buzz’ podcast to hear the latest news each weekday morning from The Salt Lake Tribune.
You can listen to both today’s episode and past episodes on Apple Podcasts, Spotify and SoundCloud.
Hear all of these stories in the Friday, April 22, episode of ‘The Daily Buzz’ podcast.
Spencer Cox declared a state of emergency because of the historic drought.
Utah continues to be dangerously dry.
